p: Table 1 shows 20 countries that have the highest confirmed cases. Apart from the number of confirmed infection cases, Table 1 also presents the number of recovered patients, the number of active cases, the number of deaths, death rate and recovery rate. It can be seen that most of the confirmed cases are in the USA. After the USA, the countries with most confirmed cases are Brazil, Russia, UK, Spain, Italy, India, and France. It can be seen from Ref. [ 22] that on February 16, 2020, China, Singapore and Japan have the first, second and third position in terms of the most number of patients having COVID-19. So, since February, the infection has spread very rapidly in other countries, while China, Singapore and Japan have managed the spread of the disease to some extent.
